thread.title: Dont'a Hightower, Tarell Brown limited in practice | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
thread.title_full: Dont'a Hightower, Tarell Brown limited in practice | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian | Boston Herald

author: Jeff Howe
title: Dont'a Hightower, Tarell Brown limited in practice | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
text:
Dont'a Hightower was limited during today's practice due to the rib injury that he suffered against the Cowboys. Interestingly, Hightower's "ribs" were listed on the injury report. On Sunday, when the Patriots announced he was questionable to return, it was due to a "rib" injury. Maybe this is taking things a little too literally, but it's possible the description of the injury means the X-rays uncovered an injury to multiple ribs since Sunday's game.
Nate Solder did not participate due to a torn biceps, and he'll be listed on the injury report until the Patriots place him on injured reserve.
On the flip side, Ryan Wendell's illness has been removed from the injury report.
Here is the full injury report.
Did not participate:
LT Nate Solder (biceps)
Limited:
CB Tarell Brown (foot)
DE Trey Flowers (knee, shoulder)
LB Dont'a Hightower (ribs)
